rather than just having one value for

points and rather than just ask you know

requests total and it might represent
how many requests your application has
received in total and this says that the
current value is 17 and what Prometheus

endpoint on a regular basis and it's
called scraping so it will scrape at

it'll read that value and say ok now the

and it does this to all the pods in in
in your cluster and this is really

things get even more interesting when

in this case we have a label called
method which represents which HTTP
method these requests are and then
rather than having one total for all the

here in this case we have 10 requests
which will gets and we have 7 requests

please tell me only about the gets and

17 kind of reconstituted out of these

starts to be this explosion of

with 200 you've got post with 200 get
with 404 and post with 404
and so now we're exposing four different

so that brought us the idea of service
profiles and service profiles are all

in kubernetes that lets you define

it's a logical grouping of paths and

this is forgets and then just a regular

should match anything that looks like
Pat looks like books and then a number
JSON and any request that has a path
that satisfies those conditions is going
to be part of this route and it will get

rather than having this explosion of
different label values now the label
values are constrained to just being
these path names and all the requests

path will get groups together and this

you're never going to have that
